Description.SourceString: Jump in front of an attack, taking the hit instead of the targeted ally. Unlike other Reflex Defenses, Intercept will trigger automatically (without a button press). In the event of rescuing multiple allies from an area of effect attack, a Hero will take a hit for each rescued ally.
Description.LocalizedString: Jump in front of an attack, taking the hit instead of the targeted ally. Unlike other Reflex Defenses, Intercept will trigger automatically (without a button press). In the event of rescuing multiple allies from an area of effect attack, a Hero will take a hit for each rescued ally.
